articles.title: Trump administration ordered to unfreeze funds to Maine despite state rejecting WH ban on trans athletes
articles.description: The USDA announced the funding freeze and a review of federal funding to Maine earlier this month after the state refused to provide equal opportunities to women and girls in educational programs.
articles.content:
A federal judge said the Trump administration must lift their freeze on federal funding to Maine.

articles.title: Freed From Prison by Trump and Now Facing the Prospect of Going Back
articles.description: At a hearing this week, witnesses described behavior by Jonathan Braun that could result in his being locked up again.
articles.content:

articles.title: US exempts smartphones, computers from global tariffs
articles.description: The United States has excluded certain electronics like smartphones and computers from President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs, according to a list of items published by the US Customs and Border Protection late last night.
articles.content:
